TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaForeignKeyColumn extends System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 动态数据使用的数据库外键字段。

span.span: Represents a database foreign-key field that is used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 动态数据应用程序中， 类表示一个表示一对一关系的数据库列。In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the class represents a database column that denotes a one-to-one relationship. 类表示包含外键字段的表中的列。The class represents the column in the table that contains the foreign-key field. 但是，您可以通过使用属性访问父表对象 。However, you can access the parent table object by using the property. 您可以通过使用属性来确定外键字段是否为包含它的表中的主键 。You can determine if the foreign-key field is a primary key in the table that contains it by using the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview

summary.span: 在指定的词典中保存外键值。

span.span: Saves the value of a foreign key in the specified dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于保存字典中包含数据字段所有新值的外键的值。The method is used to save the value of a foreign key in the dictionary that contains all the new values for a data field. 通常， 当从外键字段的控件中选择新值时，将使用方法 。Typically, the method is used when a new value is selected from a control for the foreign key field.

span.span: The alternate name that is mapped to the foreign key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回在筛选表达式中使用的替代名称，而不是实际的外键名称。This method returns the alternate name that is used in a filtering expression instead of the actual foreign-key name. 如果不存在备用名称，该方法将返回外键的实际名称。If an alternate name does not exist, the method returns the actual name of the foreign key.
